messages.message: @Bastiane this came up with Spoonful today. I think we should consider gating prompt-based clean to commercial before we GA it as it's one of the most valuable commercial features right now.
Yes, that's on my agenda to discuss with @Tom
To confirm, @Tom are you on board with gating both prompt-based refinement and quick clean or just the former?

Prompt based definitively gated

Quick clean I think could be either, no strong view

Yes, the alignment between pricing tiering and features vs actual state is something that has come up and we’re strengthening the cadence to keep these in sync. Thanks again for bringing up during QBR @Lee and here @Bastiane
IMO only I think quick clean can stay as it gives a teaser to what clean could do without taking away a significant amount of value from commercial

Separately - the client feedback on Clean and Refinement has been phenomenal. We should absolutely lean into this and do a feature release on it like with Multistep reasoning. Is there any concern around time line and things we can or cannot speak about publicly?
And quick clean is free for us to run
We will GA Clean in 23.49. Yes, let's definitely do a marketing push on this @Bas

Confirmed that prompt-based refinement will be gated while quick clean will be available for both community and commercial users at GA (23.49). @aristo @Bas we also need to update our pricing/tiering page at GA.
